      • init

        public InitResponse init​(java.lang.String apiKey,
                         Region region)
        Method accepted the API key which would be required for Server Authentication purpose
        Parameters:
        apiKey - API key required to authenticate FlagRight Server
        region - Region is required by the API

      • emit

        public void emit​(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String userId,
                 java.lang.String transactionId,
                 ResponseCallback responseCallback)
        This method needs to call after the init method. This method gets all the required attributes from device and then call the submitInfo method
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        userId - user id
        transactionId - transaction id
        responseCallback - callback that inform success and failure
